verbose_text: At Cmax, ZA significantly suppressed i) the TGF-beta-induced promotion of cell viability, ii) the TGF-beta-induced expression of MF markers such as alpha-smooth muscle actin (alpha-SMA) and type I collagen, iii) the TGF-beta-induced migratory activity of hGFs and iv) the expression level of TGF-beta type I receptor on the surfaces of hGFs, as well as the TGF-beta-induced phosphorylation of Smad2/3.
